snippet: A new law, which violates 40 years of Supreme Court precedent, bans abortions at 12 weeks of pregnancy.
abstract: Editorial criticizes Republican-led Legislature in Arkansas for overriding veto of Gov Mike Beebe and ignoring Supreme Court to adopt most restrictive abortion ban in country; laments Arkansas is hardly alone in its devotion to turning out new abortion restrictions, all of which threaten women's rights and health.
lead_paragraph: A new law, which violates 40 years of Supreme Court precedent, bans abortions at 12 weeks of pregnancy.
